Html:
Hi I am following along the tutorial and at the end of page 82 I try to run my project and encounter the following error...

 

I created the storemanagerviewmodel.cs  and edited the storemanagercontroller.cs just like the tutorial on page 80.

When I run the project it says "The type or namespace name 'StoreManagerViewModel' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)"

 

StoreManagerController & Error - http://i55.tinypic.com/2rfr694.jpg

StoreManagerViewModel - http://i52.tinypic.com/16c52xx.jpg

 

 

I copied and pasted the code from the pdf tutorial and I can't figure out where my error is.

thanks
I figured out the problem.  I forgot to add "using MvcMusicStore.ViewModels;" to the top of the StoreManagerController.cs
Yes, that would do it. Glad you spotted it.
